entity.name: Eggheads
entity.description: Some people may consider being called an egghead an insult. Others not only embrace the title but are part of a team of eggheads on the quiz show of the same name. The Eggheads team are made up of some of Britain's top quizzers, including big-money winners from other quiz shows and other trivia Goliaths. Each episode features the Eggheads facing a team of challengers trying to beat the incumbents in a quiz competition to win a cash prize. If the Eggheads beat the challengers, the cash prize is rolled over to subsequent episodes until it is won.

urls.title: The Fight For Parbold Hill Goes On ‚Äì Stop Parbold Hill Landfill
urls.description: Pressure from the Stop Parbold Hill Landfill Campaign has forced Lancashire County Council to think again about their decision to grant planning permission to the controversial works on Parbold Hill! An application to import 120,000tons of inert waste transported in 11,000 HGVs would obliterate the panoramic view from the hill enjoyed by local residents and visitors alike. It would result in the construction of a new site entrance near the brow of the hill. Traffic chaos would ensue as turning lorries
